title: Snowbound
description: Stuck indoors in the snow? Might as well warm up from the inside out. Cinnamon syrup is available in coffee shops and suppliers.

default: 1 dessertspoon cinnamon cream (double cream whipped with cinnamon syrup)

steps: Place all the ingredients, apart from the cinnamon cream, into a latté glass and stir to mix.
Spoon the cinnamon cream on top, garnish with nutmeg and serve.
